title: SaaS in AI Search: Who’s Ranking (+ How to Steal Their Spot)
description: AI chat is the number one source B2B buyers use to shortlist software. Not review sites. Not vendor websites. Not salespeople. AI chat. G2’s 2025 survey of 1,000+ decision makers found that 87% say AI tools like ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Gemini are changing ho…
content:
AI chat is the number one source B2B buyers use to shortlist software.
Not review sites. Not vendor websites. Not salespeople. AI chat.
